400.footer: If you believe you have reached this message in error, please
400.title: Nothing to see here...

404.content: The page you requested does not exist. You may have typed the address incorrectly, or th elink or applicaiton that brought you here may be out of date.
404.footer: If you believe you have reached this message in error, please
404.title: Nothing to see here...

403.content: Sorry, it doesn't seem that you have permission to access this feature. Use your browser's back button to return to the previous page; from there, you can try again or take a different action.
403.footer: If you think this is a mistake, please
403.title: We weren't expecting you here...

500.content: We're sorry; the system returned an error processing your request. You can use the back button to try again.
500.footer: If the problem persists, or you need immediate assistance, please
500.title: Well, this is embarrassing...

503.content: We're sorry; the system is temporarily unavailable. You can use the back button to try again in a few moments.
503.footer: If the problem persists or you need immediate assistance, please
503.title: Sorry, we're not here right now...
